terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.s1content:
These terms and conditions (hereinafter "Terms") apply to purchases made in the online store brightsign.cz operated by Make more s.r.o., Company ID: 21890161, VAT ID: CZ21890161 (hereinafter "Seller").

These Terms govern the mutual rights and obligations between the Seller and the buyer (hereinafter "Customer") arising from the purchase agreement concluded through the online store.
terms.s2content:
The Customer places orders through the online store by completing the order form. An order constitutes a proposal to conclude a purchase agreement.

The purchase agreement is concluded upon confirmation of the order by the Seller, sent to the Customer's email address.

The Seller reserves the right to reject an order, particularly in the case of product unavailability or an obvious pricing error.
terms.s3content:
All prices are displayed both including and excluding VAT. The binding price is the one at the time the order is submitted.

Payment methods:
- Online card payment (Stripe)
- Bank transfer
- Invoice payment (approved B2B customers only)

For bank transfers, goods are shipped after the payment is credited to the Seller's account.
terms.s4content:
In-stock items are typically dispatched within 1–3 business days of order confirmation. Items on order are delivered within the timeframe specified on the product page, usually 3–5 business days.

Shipping is provided through Packeta and other carriers as available.
terms.s5content:
Consumers have the right to withdraw from the purchase agreement without giving a reason within 14 days of receiving the goods. Withdrawal must be communicated in writing to the Seller (by email to info@brightsign.cz).

Goods must be returned undamaged, in original packaging, with all components and documents. The Seller will refund the purchase price within 14 days of receiving the returned goods.

The right of withdrawal does not apply to B2B orders (purchases under a business ID).
terms.s6content:
All goods come with a statutory warranty period of 24 months for consumers. For B2B customers, the warranty period is 12 months.

Complaints should be submitted without undue delay by email to info@brightsign.cz. Details are governed by the Complaints Procedure.
terms.s7content: The processing of personal data is governed by the Privacy Policy, available on the Privacy Policy page.
terms.s8content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Czech Republic. The Seller reserves the right to amend these Terms unilaterally. Changes take effect on the date of publication on the website.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.s1content:
The data controller is Make more s.r.o., Company ID: 21890161, VAT ID: CZ21890161.

Contact: info@brightsign.cz
privacy.s2content:
We process personal data for the following purposes:
- Order processing and fulfillment of the purchase agreement
- Communication with customers
- Accounting and fulfillment of legal obligations
- Sending marketing communications (with consent only)
- Service improvement and traffic analysis
privacy.s3content:
We process personal data based on:
- Contract performance (order processing, delivery)
- Legal obligation (accounting, tax obligations)
- Legitimate interest (fraud prevention, service improvement)
- Consent (marketing communications)
privacy.s4content:
We process the following categories of personal data:
- Identification data (name, surname, company name, company ID, VAT ID)
- Contact data (email, phone, delivery address)
- Order data (purchase history)
- Technical data (IP address, cookies)
privacy.s5content:
We retain personal data for the necessary period:
- Order data: 5 years from contract conclusion
- Accounting documents: 10 years
- Marketing consents: until consent is withdrawn
- Technical data (cookies): max. 13 months
privacy.s6content:
As a data subject, you have the right to:
- Access your personal data
- Rectification of inaccurate data
- Erasure of data (right to be forgotten)
- Restriction of processing
- Data portability
- Object to processing
- Withdraw consent

To exercise your rights, contact us at info@brightsign.cz. We will respond to your request within 30 days.
privacy.s7content:
Our website uses cookies to ensure functionality, analyze traffic, and improve services.

Types of cookies:
- Essential cookies: necessary for the website to function (no consent required)
- Analytical cookies: traffic measurement (with consent)
- Marketing cookies: content personalization (with consent)

You can change cookie settings in your browser. Rejecting essential cookies may affect website functionality.

returns.title: Complaints Procedure
returns.s1content: This Complaints Procedure governs the method and conditions for filing complaints about defective goods purchased from the online store brightsign.cz operated by Make more s.r.o., Company ID: 21890161.
returns.s2content:
Complaints can be filed by email at info@brightsign.cz. Please include:
- Order number
- Description of the defect
- Preferred resolution (repair, replacement, discount, refund)
- Photo documentation of the defect (if possible)
returns.s3content: The Seller will decide on the complaint immediately, or within 3 business days for complex cases. The complaint will be resolved no later than 30 days from the date it was filed.
